thoughtText: I'm really enjoying coding bootcamp so far!

reactions.reactionBody: That's great to hear! Keep up the good work!
Coding is a lot of fun, isn't it?

thoughtText: Struggling with JavaScript, but I won't give up.

reactions.reactionBody: JavaScript can be tricky, but you've got this!

thoughtText: Just built my first full-stack app. Feeling proud!

reactions.reactionBody: Awesome! What technology stack did you use?

thoughtText: Python is such a versatile language.

reactions.reactionBody: Absolutely! You can use Python for so many things.
